description: Tree of Life Veganics is offering tuition in return for help to build a pole barn.
title: Swale organic farm offers woodwork tuition to volunteer builders
title_page: Swale organic farm offers woodwork tuition to volunteer builders - BBC News
maintext:
People are being offered the chance to learn traditional woodworking skills in return for helping a community project.
Tree of Life Veganics, based in Selling, Kent, has been given a Â£7,000 grant from Swale Borough Council.
It plans to use the money to build a pole barn, with construction carried out in a series of workshops.
Anyone who volunteers will be taught carpentry and woodcraft.
